This blog post observed the outbreak of covid19 in South Korea and tried to understand the principles of transmission using a conceptual agent-based model. The agent-based figures were retrieved from the [Washington Post](https://www.washingtonpost.com/graphics/2020/world/corona-simulator/). 

For full description, please visit my [Korean blog](https://brunch.co.kr/@hs621/6).
